Text:
Your episodes are always in pretty good quality and thank you. I love this show and thanks to you I get to watch it.
I used to download the high resolution videos but these are great because they don't take up as much hard drive space.  I always have too keep looking for other movies and old games to delete lol.

Thanks again!
This is the last episode of the season! Thanks for uploading all the episodes so quickly! Have enjoyed watching all of them :)!
Thank you for thinking of us on the other side of the world ;)

how great it would be if s 3 and 4 would not exist
but anyway THX !
eztv i fucking love you guys. always good quality releases with no hassle or bullshit involved. keep it up guys we all love you

Thank you eztv.

I can't believe this season is over already.  Season 5 where are you? :P
